text: 9:36 Dɨboboniba 27:17; 1 Atriviba 22:17; 2 Eghaghaniba 18:16; Esekiel 34:5; Sekaraia 10:2; Matyu 14:14; Mak 6:34A gumazamizir avɨrir dafamɨn garima, men nɨghnɨziba tintinibar itima, me osɨmtɨzibar aven arua, mati sipsipbar mɨn ami, me ghuaviba puvatɨgha asaghasazibar mɨn puram arui. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, a bar men apangkufi.
